data.title: Perfect for travel
data.body: We are going to Italy with all of our kids soon and I bought these for all of our children. They all have so many cords for their phones and ear pods. This holds alot and they all loved the different colors I got so they can easily tell theirs apart from each other.

data.title: Tech cord & gadget storage
data.body: If there was a little more stretch on some of the pockets - that would be good. Otherwise I can get ear pods, various charging cords etc in this hard sided pouch & all tech things will be in the same place & it will pack easily!

data.title: A good upgrade from my smaller organizer
data.body: Went on a 2 week trip and wanted to keep all those extra cables and adapters in one place. I even stored an extra phone battery in there. Only thing I didn't like was the really small pockets sometimes let small usb-usbC adapters slide out. Should have looked for one w/ inside zippered pockets. Still, got 3 in different colors so we all could keep our cables separate and easily know whose was whose.

data.title: Tight fit
data.body: The overall concept is great, and there are plenty of compartments…but all of the compartments are just a little bit too small for the items I want to put in them. AirPods barely slide in, and are tough to get out, and the same is true for my back up battery pack. Most of the cords fit!

data.title: Smaller than advertised
data.body: The color is really nice but this product is very small. The elastic has no give. It was definitely poorly made. No way you can fit anything in here.

data.title: Gift
data.body: Just bought this as a Christmas gift for my step grandpa. Haven't taken it out of the bag yet but it looks good. My only complaint is that I chose khaki but instead of it all being khaki the zipper part is grey.
